choices.answer: A hacker using computer systems to promote own views
A hacker using computer to protect the environment
A good hacker
A hacker that wants to destroy the environment

questions.question: How would you define a Cyber Criminal?

choices.answer: A person who breaks computers
A person who commits crime
A person who breaks national or international law, using a computer
A person who breaks interplanetary law, using a computer

questions.question: How would you define a Insider

choices.answer: A person attacking from the same building
A person who is part of the organisation/an employee
Attacker using knowledge of organisation
A white hat attacker
Their age
Their ability
Their looks
Their computer
A person or organisation that creates vulnerabilities
A person or organisation that makes vulnerabilities public
A person or organisation who sells vulnerabilities
A person or organisation who fixes vulnerabilities

questions.question: How would you define a Scammer

choices.answer: Someone who cheats when playing online games
Someone who is after your personal information
Someone who would attack your computer
Someone would offer goods or services for money, but never deliver.

questions.question: How would you define a Phisher

choices.answer: Somone attempting to steal your personal information
Someone attempting to steal your IP
Someone attempting to steal your BitCoin
Someone attempting to steal your views on YouTube

questions.question: How would you describe a cyber terrorists.

choices.answer: Their is no single definition
The use of communication systems to cause fear or intimidation
All of the options
The use of computer systems to cause fear or intimidation
